tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: It's been quite some time now we have been consulting Dr. Pooja Sharma.  The one crucial thing that makes her stand out is the kind of positivity that she brings into the patient's mind with her emotional connect that she builds with them.  Being a thorough professional, she gives best possible treatment and advise. She understands the criticality of the patient's problem and makes herself available accordingly. We would definitely recommend her to anyone who's looking for a good doctor.
